intro: Euphrasia foliosa, commonly known as the leafy eyebright, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its small, yellowish flowers that bloom in early spring. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. Its leaves are ovate and often have a hairy texture, while its flowers are clustered in racemes. Euphrasia foliosa is known for its medicinal properties and has been used traditionally in herbal remedies.
